Baldur's Gate 3 Step-by-Step Character Creation Process

Origins in Baldur's Gate 3 Character Creation

Origins are like pre-made Characters that can be selected during Character Creation if players do not wish to undergo specific Customization options. Each Origin character will have different backgrounds and Classes that will also affect gameplay and interactions. Players who want to be a part of each step of the customization can opt for a Custom character while on this menu. Play
